column4: installing dapper, how long should it take to resize an existing (dapper) partition?
problem need not be ignored, they must dissappear ;)
installing dapper, how long should it take to resize an existing (dapper) partition?
I am installing a second copy of dapper (to upgrade to edgy) and am resizing an existing dapper partition (to 100GB from 160GB which is the entire drive)
it may take a while then
a while ... how long about? 2 hours? a day?
it's a big partition...give it an hour or so
thing is, the status is still at 0% even though it has been running for like 15min (at least) ...
in order to resize ext3, it has to be converted to ext2
how come? doesn't iy just have to mvoe the pieces to fit within 100GB and change the inodes accordingly?
such is the nature of ext3
